alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 3:40AM CDT until April 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...CRITICAL TO EXTREME FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR VERY STRONG SOUTHWEST WINDS, EXTREMELY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND HOT TEMPERATURES ACROSS WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 10 PM CDT Tuesday. This Red Flag Warning replaces the Fire Weather Watch. * TIMING...Late Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Lower and middle 90s. * FUELS: Dormant and extremely dry fuels will allow extreme fire behavior to develop.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected. A combination of very strong winds, extremely low relative humidity, and hot temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
